title: How to bypass "User Gesture is Required"?
content: There is an application which is launched by a script in Firefox. Basically it launches a print job. Unfortunately the application can't launch since Firefox says "User Gesture is Required". We temporarily added a button for a user gesture to be recorded but ultimately we don't want this button here. Is there any setting where we can bypass this "User Gesture is Required" check?
creator: lecapitainehaddock

title: NON ACTIVE QANTAS FREQUENT FLYER LOGIN TAG
content: Qantas frequent flyer log in(shows both business reward log in(active) and frequent flyer log in (not active) in emails from QANTAS. emails are Outlook (Hotmail) opened in Firefox (MOZILLA). I do not have the business rewards membership but am FREQUENT FLYER member -- the same email , when opened in Google or on my android phone will have the ff log in tag active and will open. I have cleared (in Firefox) QANTAS cookies, site data and cache but the problem, as above, still exists . Please help SRL sloynes@hotmail.com
creator: sloynes
